hanzi-su-wiki:
肌

Значения

Кожа, кожный покров

Мнемоника

Кожа и мясо, части тела 月 подаваемые на стол 几, а, значит, вполне пригодные для еды.

flesh; muscle
плоть; мышца
rtega_mnemonic:
肌肌RSmuscle tissue, meat on bones, skin
  • skin is the container 几 of the body and meat 月
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 几 indicates the sound; ⺼ (flesh) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
肌肉 [ jī ròu ]: muscle; flesh
肌肤 [ jī fū ]: skin; flesh; fig. close physical relationship
肌体 [ jī tǐ ]: the body; organism (usually human); (fig.) fabric (of society etc); cohesive structure (of an entity)
肌腱 [ jī jiàn ]: tendon (anatomy); sinew; hamstrings
心肌炎 [ xīn jī yán ]: myocarditis

heisig_chinese_memo: A strong wind tests the muscles of your body as you try to walk through it.
heisig_constituent: texture, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, wind
heisig_story: Ever notice how the texture of your face and hands is affected by the wind? A day's skiing or sailing makes them rough and dry, and in need of a good soft cream to soothe the burn. So whenever a part of the body gets exposed to the wind, its texture is affected. (If it is any help, the Latin word hiding inside texture connotes how something is "to the touch.")
koohiiStory1: When you expose your flesh to the wind it gets textured: goosebumps!
koohiiStory2: The moon´s lack of wind preserves its texture.
jp_example_words:
肌(はだ): skin, body, grain, texture, disposition
肌着(はだぎ): underwear, lingerie, singlet, chemise
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The moon table is a table that's made entirely of skin. You thought the table was made of moon, with all those pores and such, but when you look more closely, you realize it's skin. Disgusting, porey, skin.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Touch it and feel the "moon table." You know it's not made of moon. How ridiculous.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: But, when you go to touch this "moon table" made of skin, you realize that it's harder (はだ) than you expected.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You'd think skin would be softer, but it's pretty hard. Much harder than you expected.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the table (几) body part (⺼) is the skin
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A strong wind tests the muscles of your body as you try to walk through it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " meat " to " ji " sound. The original meaning is human muscles. "Shuowen": "Muscle, meat. From the meat, a few sounds." "Zhengzitong": "The four bones of the human body are all called muscles." Such as "Han Feizi. "Yu Lao": "When I lived for ten days, Bian Que reappeared and said: "The disease of the king is in the skin, and if it is not cured, it will be deepened." "Han Shu. "The Biography of Dong Zhongshu": "So the sound originates from harmony but from affection. It is connected to the skin and the bone marrow." See " Meat ".

" Muscle " also means skin. "Jade articles. Flesh Department: "Muscle, skin also." Such as "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "Liaogushan Mountain, where there are gods and people living in Yan, skin is like ice and snow, and Nao is like a virgin." "Selected Works. Song Yu "Dengtuzi Luscious Fu": "The eyebrows are like emerald feathers, the muscles are like snow, the waist is like girdles, and the teeth are like shells."
humanum_short_description_en: From " meat " to " ji " sound. The original meaning is human muscles and also means skin.
humanum_full_description:
從「肉」，「几」聲。本義是人的肌肉。《說文》：「肌，肉也。从肉，几聲。」《正字通》：「人身四支附骨者皆曰肌。」如《韓非子．喻老》：「居十日，扁鵲復見曰：『君之病在肌膚，不治將益深。』」《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「故聲發於和而本於情，接於肌膚，臧於骨髓。」參見「肉」。

　　「肌」也表示皮膚。《玉篇．肉部》：「肌，肌膚也。」如《莊子．逍遙遊》：「藐姑射之山，有神人居焉，肌膚若冰雪，淖約若處子。」《文選．宋玉〈登徒子好色賦〉》：「眉如翠羽，肌如白雪，腰如束素，齒如含貝。」
humanum_short_description: 從「肉」，「几」聲。本義是人的肌肉，也表示皮膚。

從「 肉 」，「 几 」聲。本義是人的肌肉。《說文》：「肌，肉也。从肉，几聲。」《正字通》：「人身四支附骨者皆曰肌。」如《韓非子．喻老》：「居十日，扁鵲復見曰：『君之病在肌膚，不治將益深。』」《漢書．董仲舒傳》：「故聲發於和而本於情，接於肌膚，臧於骨髓。」參見「 肉 」。 「 肌 」也表示皮膚。《玉篇．肉部》：「肌，肌膚也。」如《莊子．逍遙遊》：「藐姑射之山，有神人居焉，肌膚若冰雪，淖約若處子。」《文選．宋玉〈登徒子好色賦〉》：「眉如翠羽，肌如白雪，腰如束素，齒如含貝。」
From " meat" to " ji" sound. The original meaning is human muscles. "Shuowen": "Muscle, meat. From the meat, a few sounds." "Zhengzitong": "The four bones of the human body are all called muscles." Such as "Han Feizi. "Yu Lao": "When I lived for ten days, Bian Que reappeared and said: "The disease of the king is in the skin, and if it is not cured, it will be deepened." "Han Shu. "The Biography of Dong Zhongshu": "So the sound originates from harmony but from affection. It is connected to the skin and the bone marrow." See " Meat". " Muscle" also means skin. "Jade articles. Flesh Department: "Muscle, skin also." Such as "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "Liaogushan Mountain, where there are gods and people living in Yan, skin is like ice and snow, and Nao is like a virgin." "Selected Works. Song Yu "Dengtuzi Luscious Fu": "The eyebrows are like emerald feathers, the muscles are like snow, the waist is like girdles, and the teeth are like shells."

肌字的基本解释

肌
jī
人或动物体内附着在骨头上或构成内脏的柔软物质，由许多纤维组成（通称“肌肉”）：肌肤。肌理。心肌。随意肌。

肌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》居夷切，平脂，見。］
(1)肌肉。
(2)皮肤。
(3)指植物等表皮以下的物质。

肌字的英文翻译

◎ 肌
flesh, muscle, thew

肌字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　肌； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页973第07
【唐韻】居夷切【集韻】居狋切【韻會】居宜切，?音飢。【說文】肉也。【玉篇】肌膚也。【正韻】膚肉。【正字通】人身四支附骨者皆曰肌。【釋名】肌，懻也。膚幕堅懻也。　又密肌，蟲名。【爾雅·釋蟲】密肌，繼。英【註】未詳。　又【韻會】或作?。【列子·黃帝篇】?骨不䃣。　又【集韻】居氣切，音旣。體也。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
muscle
jī
The soft material attached to bones or internal organs in humans or animals is composed of many fibers (commonly known as "muscles"): skin. Texture. Myocardium. Voluntary muscles.
muscle

(1) Muscles.
(2) Skin.
(3) Substances below the epidermis such as plants.

形声字。肉(月)表意,其形像一块肉,表示肌是肉;几(j)表声,几本是供人倚靠的家具,倚靠时接触到几儿的是肌
肉。本义是人的肌肉。
肌肉,人或动物的组织之一,由许多肌纤维组成:~肤」
~体「面黄~瘦。
~腱 ~理 ~肉 腹~ 心~ 冰~玉骨 铭~镂骨
肌
ji
M|取|肌
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Мясо (месяц) означает, что его форма похожа на кусок мяса, что означает, что мышца - это мясо; несколько звуков знака (j) представляют собой мебель, на которую люди могут опираться, и касаются мышц при наклоне.
Первоначальное значение - человеческие мышцы.
Мышца, одна из тканей человека или животных, состоит из множества мышечных волокон: ~ кожа ''
~ Тело "Желтолицое ~ Худое.
~ Сухожилие ~ Ли ~ Мясное брюхо ~ Сердце ~ Бинг ~ Надпись из нефритовой кости ~ Полая кость
мышца
M | взять | мышцы
Кай
jī
I сущ.
1) анат. мускул, мышца; мускульный, мышечный
胸肌 грудная мышца
平滑肌 гладкие мышцы
肌组织 мышечная ткань
2) плоть, тело, комплекция
雪肌 белоснежное тело
肌瘦面黄 тощий и бледный
3) кожа, поверхность тела
肌色 цвет кожи (тела)
II словообр.
в сложных терминах (биология, медицина) соответствует приставке мио-, например
肌朊 миоген
肌马 палеонт. миогиппус
心肌 миокардий
肌学家 миолог
肌肉上皮 миоэпителий
肌磷酸转化酶 миокиназа
Radicals: 月, 几  (moon, table)
Meaning Mnemonic
The moon table is a table that's made entirely of skin. You thought the table was made of moon, with all those pores and such, but when you look more closely, you realize it's skin. Disgusting, porey, skin.
Touch it and feel the "moon table." You know it's not made of moon. How ridiculous.
Reading Mnemonic
But, when you go to touch this "moon table" made of skin, you realize that it's harder (はだ) than you expected.
You'd think skin would be softer, but it's pretty hard. Much harder than you expected.
